channel.title: Version 7 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 7.6.0 (XXXX-XX-XX) New New Th' free menu configurat'n fer th' main menu area, introduced 'n 7.1.0, be extended t' th' non-scoll'n menu header area between search box an' main scroll'n area us'n th' sidebarheadermenus opt'n.
